page.title: 03HOLLINS BROW - A LOCAL ISSUE
page.content: Hollins Brow was closed to traffic in 1983, following fears that it would collapse under the weight of heavy traffic on its way to{Pilsworth} industrial estate. The road had never been intended for such heavy traffic also heading for the nearby{M66. } A survey of local residents showed the following opinions : {90%}felt that action taken sooner would have saved the road. {100%}of the shopkeepers felt that their businesses had been badly affected {80%}thought that there should be a restriction on lorries when it does reopen (late 1985). {95%}intended to claim a rate rebate as a result of longer journeys. Repair work began in June 1985. Hollins Grundy Primary.
